description.en: Son of Kannayya of Karnataka, Śivarāmabhaṭṭa was placed in the Pīṭha by Saccidvilāsayati; resplendent like the Sun, He adorned the Pīṭha and merged in his effulgence on the sixth day of the bright fortnight of Vaiśākha in the year Bhava. This Ujjvala Mahādevendra remained in the Pīṭha for forty-two years and attained siddhi at Kāñci itself on the sixth day of Śuklapakṣa of Vaiśākha ,month in the year Bhava.

shlokas:
karNATakaNNayasutaH zivarAmabhaTTaH saccidvilAsayaminA suhitaH svapIThE.
adhyAsya taM ravi(42)samA bhavarAdhazuddhaSaSThIpradOSaviratau virataH svadhAmni..83..
